name: Bitbucket
title: A visual cheat-sheet for the 35 keyboard shortcuts found on Bitbucket

cards.title: Intro
cards.body: A visual cheat-sheet for the 35 keyboard shortcuts found on Bitbucket

cards.title: All pages
cards.body:
| Shortcut | Action                              |
| -------- | ----------------------------------- |
| `?`      | Display keyboard shortcuts          |
| `[`      | Expand and collapse left navigation |
| `/`      | Focus the site search               |

cards.title: Most pages (except Your Work and Source)
cards.body:
| Shortcut | Action                         |
| -------- | ------------------------------ |
| `.`      | Open the Omnibar               |
| `J`      | Select next item               |
| `K`      | Select previous item           |
| `Enter`  | View selected item             |
| `G` `D`  | Go to Your Work dashboard      |
| `G` `A`  | Go to your Personal Settings   |
| `Esc`    | Dismiss dialog or remove focus |
| `U`      | Go back                        |

cards.title: Repository pages (except for Source)
cards.body:
| Shortcut | Action                        |
| -------- | ----------------------------- |
| `C` `R`  | Create a repository           |
| `I` `R`  | Import a repository           |
| `R` `S`  | Open repository source        |
| `R` `C`  | Open repository commits       |
| `R` `B`  | Open repository branches      |
| `R` `P`  | Open repository pull requests |
| `R` `I`  | Open repository issues        |
| `R` `W`  | Open repository wiki          |
| `R` `D`  | Open repository downloads     |
| `R` `A`  | Open repository settings      |
| `F`      | Search for file               |

cards.title: Repository pages (except for Source and Settings)
cards.body:
| Shortcut | Action                   |
| -------- | ------------------------ |
| `X` `F`  | Fork repository          |
| `X` `B`  | Create branch            |
| `X` `C`  | Compare branches or tags |
| `X` `P`  | Create pull request      |
| `X` `I`  | Create issue             |

cards.title: Pull requests
cards.body:
| Shortcut       | Action                                  |
| -------------- | --------------------------------------- |
| `Ctrl` `Enter` | Submit a comment                        |
| `T` `C`        | Toggle display of inline comments       |
| `P` `D`        | Switch to the pull request diff tab     |
| `P` `C`        | Switch to the pull request commits tab  |
| `P` `A`        | Switch to the pull request activity tab |
| `Shift` `T`    | Show the list of tasks                  |

cards.title: Repository pages with sidebar
cards.body:
| Shortcut | Action                            |
| -------- | --------------------------------- |
| `]`      | Expand and collapse right sidebar |

cards.title: Repository source
cards.body:
| Shortcut | Action                |
| -------- | --------------------- |
| `F`      | Focus the file filter |
